document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the Kateretidae and Nitidulidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Cucujoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the Kateretidae and Nitidulidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Cucujoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , France , Greece , Hungary , Italy , Japan , Kazakhstan , Lebanon , Macedonia , Moldavia , Morocco , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Syria , Turkey , Ukraine , Uzbekistan .

Meligethes gredleri Reitter, 1873
.

Distribution within Iran .
Golestan (Kirejtshuk 1977 ; Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , France , Georgia , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Lebanon , Macedonia , Moldavia , Morocco , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , Syria , the Netherlands , Turkey , Ukraine .

Material examined. Mazandaran, Alborz Mts., Haraz Chay (loc. no. 69 ), 23 .- 24 .
vii. 1970, 1
spec. (NMPC), (third Czechoslovak-Iranian expedition to Iran 1977 ).

Distribution within Iran .
East Azarbaijan, Golestan (Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ), Northern Iran (no locality cited) (Jacobson 1913 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Whole Palaearctic Region (excluding North Africa).

tr.th: Distribution outside Iran. Endemic to Iran.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution within Iran .
Mazandaran, Tehran (Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Afghanistan , India , Pakistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan .

Material examined. Mazandaran, N Iran , 8 km NE Ziaran, 2400 m (loc.no. 400 ),
10 .- 16 .vii. 1977
, 38 spec. (NMPC), (third Czechoslovak-Iranian expedition to Iran 1977 ).

Distribution within Iran .
Northern Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Spornraft 1979 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Armenia , Azerbaijan , Iraq , Turkey , Ukraine .

Meligethes transsylvanicus Petri, 1912
.

Distribution within Iran .
Tehran (Sakenin et al . 2008 a).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Andorra , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Finland , France , Georgia , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Ireland , Italy , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Latvia , Liechtenstein , Lithuania , Luxembourg , Macedonia , Moldavia , Norway , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , the Netherlands , Turkey , Ukraine .

Material examined. Kerman, Sarbizhan, 140 km S Kerman, 2700 m , 5 .
v. 2010, 1
spec., lgt. et coll. K. Orszulik; Kuhgiloyeh & Boyerahmad, Zagros Mts., Mazandaran, Alboorz Mts., Kandavan pass, southern slope, 2700-2900 m (loc. no. 395 ), 19 spec. (NMPC), (third Czechoslovak-Iranian expedition to Iran 1977 ).

Distribution within Iran .
Golestan, Mazandaran, Tehran (Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ); Sisakht (Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Andorra , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , France , Georgia , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Kazakhstan , Lebanon , Luxembourg , Macedonia , Moldavia , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Syria , the Netherlands , Turkey , Ukraine .

Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Whole Palaearctic Region.

Distribution within Iran
. Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Turkey .

paragraph.emphasis: Stachygethes zarudnyi Kirejtshuk, 1984 Genus Thymogethes Audisio & Cline, 2009

subSubSection.paragraph:
Meligethes angulosus Rebmann, 1940
.

Distribution within Iran .
East Azarbaijan (Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , France , Georgia , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Italy , Macedonia , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , Turkey , Ukraine .

Material examined. Mazandaran, 8 km NE Ziaran, 2400 m (loc.no. 400 ), 10 .- 16 .
vii. 1977, 31
spec. (NMPC), (third Czechoslovak-Iranian expedition to Iran 1977 ).

Distribution within Iran .
Mazandaran, Tehran (Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ), Semnan (Grouvelle 1912 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Finland , France , Georgia , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Kazakhstan , Latvia , Lebanon , Liechtenstein , Lithuania , Macedonia , Moldavia , Poland , Romania , Russia , Saudi Arabia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Syria , The Netherlands , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine .

Material examined. Mazandaran, 8 km NE Ziaran, 2400 m (loc.no. 400 ), 10 .- 16 .
vii. 1977, 5
spec. (NMPC), (third Czechoslovak-Iranian expedition to Iran 1977 ).

Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Georgia , Greece , Italy , Macedonia , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovenia , Turkey , Ukraine .

Meligethes ahriman Jelínek, 1981
.

Examined material. Yazd, Shir Kuh, 5 km S Taft, 1600-1700 m ,
23 .v. 2008
, leg. Mühle, 1 ex. (NKME).
Distribution within Iran .
Fars (Jelínek 1981 under
M . ahriman
; Audisio et al . 2000 ), Western Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek 1981 under
M . ahriman
; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Afghanistan , India (Kashmir), Pakistan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan .

Distribution within Iran .
Kerman (Jelínek 1981 under
M. glaucii
).

Distribution outside Iran .
Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , Georgia , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Kazakhstan , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Turkey , Ukraine .

Distribution within Iran .
East Azarbaijan (Kirejtshuk 1977 under
M . brisouti Reitter
; Audisio et al . 2000 ), Khorasan (Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , Georgia , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Turkey , Ukraine .

Meligethes obsoletus Rey, 1889
.

Material examined. Kordestan, Sanandaj ( 1479 m ), 1 spec.,
September 2008
, leg. H. Ghahari, dep. SRIAU. New Iranian record.

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Algeria , Andorra , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Egypt , France , Georgia , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Lebanon , Libya , Malta , Macedonia , Morocco , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovenia , Spain , Syria , Switzerland , The Netherlands , Tunisia , Turkey , Ukraine .

Distribution within Iran .
Khorasan, Khuzestan, Tehran, Yazd (Audisio et al . 2000 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia .

Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
